name: Into the Fediverse with Evan Prodromou, co-author of ActivityPub (The Changelog #528)
summary: This week Evan Prodromou is back to take us deeper into the Fediverse. As many of us reconsider our relationship with Twitter, Mastodon has been by-and-large the target of migration. They helped to popularize the idea of a federated universe of community-owned, decentralized, social networks. And, at the heart of it al...
